speakers.name: Arnold
speakers.bio:
Arnold is a sculptor who specialize in sculptures that look 
						like running water. He has pieces on display at the White House, 
						the Smithsonian, and the Masonic Temple in Detroit.

speakers.name: Beaumont
speakers.bio:
Beaumont is a chef who loves prawns, prunes, and pringles. 
						She specializes in salty, crunchy seafood dishes that pass easily 
						and defy anyone who tries to eat just one.

speakers.name: Becky
speakers.bio:
Becky is a master of origami. She is currently working she works out 
						a new original design for the world's largest origami crane, which will 
						feature an intricate latticed boom.

speakers.name: Raymond
speakers.bio:
Raymond is a passionate singer/songwriter. He is making a name for 
						himself in Austin, Texas, where the music capitol is tuning in to his 
						unique voice and sophisticated style.

speakers.name: Matthew
speakers.bio:
Matt is a granola camper who has hiked the entirety of the Appalachian 
						Trail and scaled the Matterhorn. He studies aroma therapy and horticulture 
						in his spare time.

speakers.name: Jazz Winston
speakers.bio:
Jazz is the world's best dog. He likes to run on the soccer field, 
						to play squeaky squirrel, and to eat chicken biscuits. On hot days, 
						he passes the time catching flies on the patio.
